name: Color Snap (Entity_8zero8)
description:
OK, soooo you move with the classic wasd (also works with arrow keys) and space to jump or with a controller (recommended (Lstick to move, A to jump, DO NOT PRESS B)). You only interact with the things that have your same color. For the theme I used it literally, because when you change, the world changes.

I used the most recent version of Godot (3.2.3), with GLES3. I didn't found the wildcards images (WHYYYYY??!!!), but the only one that fits the game is the HUD-less one.

And yes, play the game, rate it (Make me win, come ooon) and please don't notice the lack of contents, the variety of bugs and the overall sh***y look of the game. Also notice that I made this game in basically 3 days (school's fault).

And finally the Source Code
